#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	char a[33],c[33];
	int t,max,b;
	map<string,int>count;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	max=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		count[a]+=b;
		if(count[a]>max)
		{
			max=count[a];
			strcpy(c,a);
			//cout<<c<<max;
		}
		
	}
	cout<<c;
}
